courses.advice_detail_en: Chilly conditions. Long sleeves and tights or light layering are recommended. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. courses.advice_detail_en: Chilly conditions. Long sleeves and tights or light layering are recommended. Almost no wind, good for maintaining your pace. Some snow or meltwater on the surface may cause slipperiness. Trail running shoes or shoes with good grip are recommended. Air quality is poor. If you have respiratory or heart issues, avoid intense outdoor running. Extra cautions: Air quality caution, Night caution. Adjust intensity based on how you feel and check your condition more often than usual.
